definition: "dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
tranquilizer/sth that sets one's mind at ease
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
Orochimaru, Japanese folktale hero/Orochimaru, character in the Naruto manga series

sentences.english: A flame AAS method is employed for the determination of lead in a traditional patented medicinal preparation "Xinling Pill".
sentences.chinese: 采用火焰原子吸收光谱法测定中成药心灵丸中的铅。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for identification of Dangshen Guben pills by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立党参固本丸的薄层色谱鉴别方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To observe the effects of Xinyi Biyan pill containing Fructus Xanthii on liver function.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究含有苍耳子的辛夷鼻炎丸对肝脏功能的影响。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the quality control method for Dangshen Lizhong concentrated pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的完善党参理中浓缩丸的质量控制方法。

sentences.english: Businessmen take a walk in Tokyo's downtown financial districts of Otemachi and Marunouchi.
sentences.chinese: 商人们走在东京市中心金融区大手町和丸之内。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preparation of Xiaoli pills and observe its clinical therapeutic effects .
sentences.chinese: 目的蛸蛎丸的制备及临床疗效观察。

sentences.english: Won the eclipse heart Fu bone pill anew how?
sentences.chinese: 中了蚀心腐骨丸又如何？

sentences.english: Do not use birth control pills; use a condom without spermicide instead.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用避孕丸，以不含杀精剂的保险套取代。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Xiaoyu pill on hyperlipidemia with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察消瘀丸对2型糖尿病血脂异常的临床疗效。

sentences.english: For maximum effectiveness, you must take the minipill at the same time every day.
sentences.chinese: 为了取得最佳效果，你必须每天准时服用迷你避孕丸。

sentences.english: Unique keyboard by Japanese electronics company Marubeni Infotec.
sentences.chinese: 这款独特的键盘由日本电子公司丸红株式会社制造。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method can be used for the quality control of Lixin Pill.
sentences.chinese: 结论鉴别方法可靠，可用于利心丸的上述成分鉴别。

sentences.english: Background Shexiang Baoxinwan has been used in treating coronary heart disease(CHD) for over thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 背景麝香保心丸自研发上市至今已达三十余年之久。

sentences.english: Storm family is " birdie pill" the chief.
sentences.chinese: 是暴风族“小鸟丸”的总长。

sentences.english: Defrost cuttlefish ball and grill or barbecue till cooked and serve.
sentences.chinese: 烧烤解冻后墨鱼丸直到熟为止。

sentences.english: Marubeni is one of the largest trading houses in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 丸红是日本最大的贸易公司之一。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
